tool_description: Analyzes collections of research summaries to identify gaps, underexplored areas, and potential research opportunities in the literature.

source_summaries.description: Array of research summaries to analyze

analysis_depth.description: Depth of gap analysis (surface, moderate, deep)

methodological_focus.description: Whether to focus on methodological gaps

error_messages: Insufficient summaries: At least 5 research summaries required for meaningful gap analysis.
Too many summaries: Maximum 100 summaries can be processed at once.
Invalid analysis depth: Use surface, moderate, or deep.
Invalid time period: Provide valid years with start_year <= end_year.
Missing research domain: Specify the primary research domain being analyzed.
Analysis failed: Unable to identify meaningful gaps from provided summaries.
usage: Provide source_summaries array and research_domain. Optionally set analysis_depth, time_period, methodological_focus, and geographic_scope for targeted gap identification.

gap_categories.description: Categories of gaps found (theoretical, methodological, empirical)

gap_priority_scores.description: Priority scores for each identified gap
